attributes.action: Donate all monies reclaimed/repaid by MP's to an Armed Forces Charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our brave troops have worked harder for Britian than anyone else in the last four years, and as a debt of gratitude from the government and the British public we ask the PM to donate all reclaimed/repaid expenses to a charity that works with and supports our brave troops.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
